definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: In the disappearing existence sentences, the verbs must be mono-valent ones.
sentences.chinese: 隱現句中的動詞只能是一價動詞。

sentences.english: This reporter visited several random practice of " one- room price ."
sentences.chinese: 本報記者隨機走訪了幾個實行“多房一價”的項目。

sentences.english: The univalent radical derived from benzoic acid.
sentences.chinese: 從苯甲酸衍生而來的一價化學基。

sentences.english: A univalent chemical radical derived from ethylene.
sentences.chinese: 從乙烯衍生而來的一價化學基。

sentences.english: A gnome inventor claims he can build a flying ship.
sentences.chinese: 一個侏儒發明家聲稱他可以製造一價飛船。
